data.text: @55depp55 @cookiris14 The No then Remain votes by Scotland demonstrated that we have a good grasp of how to look after economic interests of our country. The EU will look more favourably on an Independent Scotland's application to join as a result of how we've historically voted. A silver lining.
@Guiseppim Yeah the good old bad days 😳 we can do better as a Indy Scotland with 27 other Indy country’s inside EU making deals throughout the world 🌍
@55depp55 The good old eggy days... https://t.co/OZrqj3c30l
